author: By Adam Durbin
title: Paul O'Grady: A life in pictures
content: Presenter, comedian and drag queen Paul O'Grady, who has died aged 67 <https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-65108130>, had a vibrant and varied career in the entertainment industry spanning more than three decades.After making his mark on London's comedy scene as Lily Savage, O'Grady would go on to become one of the most recognisable faces on TV.All pictures subject to copyright.
